dataset.title: Climatic and human influences on fire regimes of the southern San Juan Mountains, Colorado, USA.

abstract.para: Grissino-Mayer, H.D., W.H. Romme, M.L. Floyd-Hanna and D. Hanna. 2003. Climatic and human influences on fire regimes of the southern San Juan Mountains, Colorado, USA. Ecology.

intellectualRights.para: The broad spectrum of possible applications of paleoenvironmental data suggests an array of potential users of the database, ranging from the original collectors of the data, their collaborators, interested scientists, reviewers, meta-analysts, resource managers and educators. We would like published data in the database to be available without restrictions and free of cost. For end users to get the most value from the records, it is important that data be archived in a format that can be interpreted by non-specialists both now and in the future. Our central goal has been to ensure that users can easily access the raw data and correctly interpret the records.

geographicCoverage.geographicDescription: Data set coverage: San Juan Mountains
